alert.note: Alert for Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 12:12AM EST until February 23 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...West Canada Creek At Kast Bridge. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 6.0 feet, Minor flood stage. The river begins to overflow into low lying RV parks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 5.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 6.3 feet early this morning. It will then fall below flood stage later this morning. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 6.3 feet on 03/18/1990. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && West Canada Creek Kast Bridge Flood Stage: 6.0 Observed Stage at Tue 11 pm: 5.6 Forecast: Wed 1 am 6.3 Wed 7 am 6.1 Wed 1 pm 5.5 Wed 7 pm 5.1 Thu 1 am 4.8 Thu 7 am 4.6 Thu 1 pm 4.5 Thu 7 pm 4.4 Fri 1 am 4.3 Fri 7 am 4.3 Fri 1 pm 4.2 Fri 7 pm 4.1 &&
